title: Sautéed wild mushrooms with bacon, spring onion and mashed potato cakes and fried duck eggs
ingredients: 600g/1lb 5oz floury potatoes, peeled, cut into pieces
6 rashers smoked streaky bacon, roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
300g/11oz mixed wild mushrooms, cleaned (torn apart if large)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
